greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: LCM of the strict integer partition with FDH number n.
comment: Let f(n) = A050376(n) be the n-th Fermi-Dirac prime. The FDH number of a strict integer partition (y_1, ..., y_k) is f(y_1) * ... * f(y_k).
example: 45 is the FDH number of (6,4), which has LCM 12, so a(45) = 12.
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Sep 28 2018
